welcomeDescription: Take a quick walk through how to use Simoona.
wallsDescription: This is a discussions place, called Walls. You can view the entire list of walls, follow or join the discussion, and create a new Wall to talk on a hot new topic.
activitiesDescription: Here are all your activities. You can join an event, or create a new event for others to join, view Kudos statistics, take books, or order other company services.
companyDescription: This is a company place. It provides information about your colleagues, you can view the office map, organizational structure, projects and other company related info.
profileDescription: This is your place. Here you can edit your profile information and edit notificationsâ€™ and language settings.
kudosDescription: This is a Kudos place. Here you can quickly send Kudos to your colleagues by clicking the Plus icon and see the latest on who got Kudos and for what.
administrationDescription: Here you administrate and customize Simoona. You can confirm new users, edit user roles, offices and rooms, Kudos basket and so on.
